climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: SUPERIOR COMFORT - Queen pillows have a 250 thread count cover filled with a soft down alternative. One of the best first apartment or new home essentials gift for bedroom, guest bed room, college dorm or house decor.
KEEP COOL - If you easily overheat, or maybe you're looking for cool queen size pillows for night sweats, the breathability of our standard bed pillow can offer welcome relief.
SAFE & SOUND - These fluffy bed pillows are made in an OEKO-TEX Standard Certified factory that ensures textiles meet high safety and environmental standards.
EASY CLEAN - Unlike memory foam pillows, our pillow for side sleepers is designed to make life as easy! Simply pop them in the washer and tumble dry.

NO SHIFT DESIGN - Whether you're a back, side, or stomach sleeper - our cooling pillows for sleeping can accommodate! The plush bounce-back design of this firm pillow will keep its shape in any position.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Beckham Home Collection Original Down Alternative Pillow is designed with super plush fiber and a soft cotton cover. Expertly tailored to ensure maximum comfort in any and all sleeping positions.

OEKO-TEX Certified Our pillows are OEKO-TEX Certified and made for a comfy night's sleep. No-Shift Design High-quality materials keep their shape without bunching or distorting, no matter how long you use them. All-Season Use Breathable cotton and down fill helps keep the temperature just right, so you can keep dreaming. Plush Support Extra plush fill provides you with the ideal support you need for a better night’s rest.
EASY CARE INSTRUCTIONS FOR YOUR PILLOWS

COMPLETE YOUR DREAM LOOK 2-pc Microfiber Fitted Sheets 4-pc Microfiber Pillowcases All-Season Duvet Insert Ultra Comfy Sheets This double-pack, soft-brushed microfiber sheet set keeps you cool year-round. Soft & Smooth Pillowcases Four silky smooth pillowcases help you stay cool and provide all-season comfort. All-Season Ready Sleep cooler & comfortably in the summer, warmer in winter Breathable Allows for cool nights, even on the hottest days Machine Washable Wash in cold and dries quick on tumble dry low Superior Softness High-quality microfiber with ultra-soft quilt design

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wasn’t sure at first but ohhh then -YES!!!
reviews.reviewText: I let it fluff up a few days in a spare bedroom before using. Seemed pretty thick but when laying upon it it went down appropriately. I felt the inside and could feel a gel type lining mixed with fluff. Beautiful design and sharp sleep threading. Defiantly higher quality material and stitching. Sift as all feel. Cool to the touch. First night I knew it would be different as I’ve been using a harder memory foam which has not been good for my neck. Then I bought softer plain pillows that turned into pancakes within weeks that also weren’t good for my neck. Lol. Then I bought the my pillow pillow which felt like sleeping on tons of foam pieces but was better then the other two but it was not smooth and soft and comfy at all. Strike 3. At that point I was just sick of the pillow roulette game. Soooo I started researching the web on what pillows were out there and why they were better or worse. Studies showed that a mixed gel type Fiber filling pillow was best. Fluff with gel fibers or fluff with foam fibers or any number of those combinations. Density was a big thumbs up. But to many pillows are overfilled so then thumbs down. Down pillows were a suggested good choice also but I didn’t enjoy the occasional prick of a feather piece in my face nor the idea I was sleeping on birds so I stopped getting them. In summer they’d make me sweat. Seems like getting a pillow perfect is a tough business. Everyone’s different so some like them flatter some like them fatter. The choices and options are endless of course. But it seems from data of pulled research from across the US that most or more people preferred after sleep tests a pillow that had fluff and gel type fiber filling. I thought they probably would be a fortune but at this point I’d pay it to rest. So I then went to Amazon my go to for everythinggggg- (love Amazon) and this pillow had a lot of great user reviews and then a friend told me tons of hotel chains use them, and then my daughter said she’d had them on all her beds. WHO KNEW! But for 40 bucks for two nice pillows I figured what the heck! First nights on a new pillow are always weird. I learned long ago you can’t base any opinion on one night on a mattress or blankets or a pillow. I thought it might not be thick enough at first because I was by then used to a hard memory foam pillow. But it was pretty nice but I needed to wait a few more nights to see. When you pick it up it has a nice middle weight. Not to heavy like my memory foam ones or my down ones. Night two I moved it around a lot and snuggled my face into it and it was soooo nice. After a bit I did doze off and woke up a few times trying to get comfy with a new pillow. Night three I was over tired laid right down and crashed and woke up thinking oh my gosh that’s a nice pillow after all. Night four was perfect. I am supported just enough, but not to much. It’s a solid pillow but not to bulky like memory foam. It does depress to conform but not flatten. It’s cool to the skin and I don’t overheat. It keeps its shape after you sleep on it. It fluffs back up when you make your bed and leave it. I don’t sink in but I don’t feel like I’m laying on a huge rubber mound. It’s pretty much the perfect pillow for me personally and I’m a picky pillow person. Lol. This is just my unbiased review that others may or may not agree with but for me- it’s a 5 star! If your looking for a super supportive firmer pillow this isn’t it. If your looking for a softer no filling type pillow this isn’t it. It’s right in between with enough of perfect combination of everything. I sleep on all positions changing through the night so this one works great for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So I waited awhile for these. I knew that when I ordered how long it would take. It just took so long cuz it was so worth it!!! Trust me, these are nice. Husband and I fell asleep so fast the first night we got them. It’s the right amount of firmness and softness. I tend to like mine on the firm side while my husband likes it soft. I’ve used them for a few weeks. It still has kept its shape. I just think it’s more firm now and not as soft. So I switch between my softer pillow and this one. I’m considering the softer version of this one. Maybe I might go the full feather ones to please my husband. Then we have both kinds to switch between the two and everyone is happy. I will pay good money for good quality pillows. These for the value is worth the splurge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft, comfy, just right
reviews.reviewText: I loved my first set of these pillows — soft, but supportive, and have lasted much longer than most pillows of similar cost. However, my second set were stiffer, and never really settled. I use one as a back pillow, and the other as a dog pillow, so either my second pair were a new design or bad batch (in comparison). Worth the money either way, just unexpected to have the same pillows feel so different

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long review, but I'd recommend these Sleep Restoration/Beckham Hotel pillows.
reviews.reviewText: OK, let's clear up a few things:1) I am a real buyer, was not given this pillow, was not paid to review this pillow. There's no way I'm doing any of that.2) I want everyone to know exactly what I'm giving an opinion on. This "Beckham Hotel" pillow is the very same as others called "Sleep Restoration Super Plush Gel-Fiber Filled Pillows". That's what the package the two pillows (costing $35 total) came in reads, and there's a small bar-coded sticker with tiny writing indicating the Beckham Hotel re-branding.3) There's NO smell. There's NO mildew. They arrived factory clean and shipped in a nice, zipped plastic container bag.4) They arrive dead flat. When you remove them, they start to fluff up. I'd say after an hour or so they are ready to use. Fluff them a bit, and you can sleep on them right away. It's not necessary to put them in a dryer and in fact it could be detrimental. Not sure.5) I waited a month to write this because I wanted to be sure I liked the pillows. I do!6) I had some doubts at first because I thought they'd be too soft, but after a couple of nights I would now describe them as soft, yet firm enough to support my head and neck correctly. I start out sleeping on my side and of course, at some point end up on my back, and then often back on my side.7) They're heavy enough to no move around, but not heavy like a (solid) memory foam pillow is. They stay put in other words.8) I purchased the queen sized ones. Now, it was sort of interesting to me that these are 20 inches wide, and yet a queen size pillowcase is also 20 inches wide. Yet, a pillow is quite high and a pillowcase is of course - flat. This means it requires some effort to squeeze the pillow into the pillowcase. BUT, perhaps this makes the pillow seem a bit firmer than my initial impression of it was in paragraph #6. At any rate, it works and these have worked out well for me.9) I woke up in a hotel about 4 years ago with neck pain and had it ever since. All sorts of chiropractic efforts, daily neck stretches, painkillers, etc. just didn't seem to get rid of it. I ditched my Tempur-Pedic s-shaped solid memory foam pillow and tried several other pillows I got locally. They all went back. I got these pillows, continued on the daily neck stretches and now I'm feeling fine with no more neck pain. I noticed about a week ago I was waking up with no more neck pain. That's a relief.That's about all I can tell you Amazon shoppers. Buying a pillow is a wilderness of choice. I spent a LOT of hours on here looking. And of course pillows, and the comfort of them, is very personal and subjective. I can only say, for me, these worked out. If they don't for you, I assume you can return them, possibly with some shipping cost. I don't know. I'm not a regular Amazon customer and not a Prime member.Best of luck finding yours!-MSW

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This pillow is amazing. I’ve been looking for the perfect pillow and must’ve went through at least 40 different ones before I tried this one. I needed a pillow that gave good neck support so I didn’t buy this pillow initially because I didn’t think it would. Not only is it soft and fluffy and unbelievably comfortable, but it supports my neck perfectly. It doesn’t flatten down. It keeps its shape and buoyancy. I don’t know what it is about this pillow that makes it so perfect, but I’m so glad I purchased it. I plan on stocking up with a few more just in case they stop making them. Love this pillow!
Super soft yet still conforms to your head. These are some of the nicest pillows I have ever bought definitely great bang for your buck. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewTitle: Die Kissen behalten ihre Form bei und sind einfach grandios.
reviews.reviewText: Ich habe diese Kissen aufgrund der positiven Bewertungen und des unschlagbaren Preises erworben, da ich nicht viel Geld für Kopfkissen ausgeben wollte. Seit langem war ich auf der Suche nach neuen Kissen für mein Bett, um endlich einen erholsamen Schlaf zu finden. Ich habe bereits zahlreiche Nackenkissen ausprobiert und hatte jede Nacht einen unangenehmen Schlaf, bis ich diese fantastischen Kissen entdeckt habe. Seit dem ersten Tag schlafe ich wie ein Engel – sie sind unglaublich angenehm, weich, nicht zu hoch und nicht zu platt. Die Kissen behalten ihre Form bei und sind einfach grandios.Es ist wichtig zu beachten, dass diese Kissen nicht riesig oder extrem dick sind. Ich kann sie nur empfehlen und widerspreche einer negativen Bewertung hier. Der Geruch beim Auspacken ist ganz normal, wie bei jedem anderen neuen Artikel. Er riecht einfach "NEU". Falls Sie also nach preiswerten Kissen suchen, sollten Sie unbedingt zuschlagen! Sie erhalten sogar 2 Stück für den Preis. Nein, ich erhalte nichts für diese Rezension – dies ist meine freie Meinung zu diesem Produkt. Ich würde es immer wieder kaufen.
Kommer komprimerad och ska räta ut sig över ett par timmar. Min låg i 12 timmar ungefär. Den har fortfarande lite klumpar i sig, som försvinner lite när jag "fluffar" up den. Skön att sova med ändå.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very thin not like photos, very disappointed to pay 155 euro for this normal product, very thin.The inner filling of the pillow is heterogeneous, blocked
